### Synthpop

```{r}
data<-read.csv("data/dataR2 (2).csv")
head(data)
```

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(synthpop))
synth.obj <- syn(data,  seed = 1024)
mycols <- c("darkmagenta", "turquoise")
compare1<-compare(synth.obj, data, nrow = 3, ncol = 4, cols =mycols)
compare1$plot
```
